chapters.name: Electric Charges and Fields
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 1 Electric Charges and Fields solutions. Exercises.

chapters.name: Electrostatic Potential and Capacitance
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 2 Electrostatic Potential and Capacitance solutions. Exercises.

chapters.name: Current Electricity
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 3 Current Electricity solutions. Exercises.

chapters.name: Moving Charges and Magnetism
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 4 Moving Charges and Magnetism solutions. Magnetic Field Due to Current, Magnetic Field Due to Current - Direction, Magnetic Field Due to Current - Applications, Force on Current-Carrying Conductor, Force on Current-Carrying Conductor in Solenoid, Force Between Parallel Current-Carrying Wires.

chapters.name: Magnetism and Matter
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 5 Magnetism and Matter solutions. Torque on Bar Magnet, Equilibrium and Potential Energy of Bar Magnet, Solenoid as Bar Magnet, Torque on Solenoid, Work Done in Rotating Bar Magnet, Solenoid - Magnetic Moment and Torque.

chapters.name: Electromagnetic Induction
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 6 Electromagnetic Induction solutions. Faraday's Law and Lenz's Law, Lenz's Law and Direction of Induced Current, Faraday's Law - Induced EMF, Motional EMF, Motional EMF - Rotating Rod, Motional EMF in Earth's Field.

chapters.name: Alternating Current
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 7 Alternating Current solutions. AC Circuits - Power and Current, Peak vs RMS Values, Inductive Reactance, Capacitive Reactance, AC Circuits - Power, LC Oscillations.

chapters.name: Electromagnetic Waves
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 12 Physics Part 1 Chapter 8 Electromagnetic Waves solutions. Displacement Current and Capacitor, Displacement Current in AC Circuit, Properties of EM Waves, Direction of E and B in EM Wave, EM Spectrum - Radio Waves, Generation of EM Waves.
